testsuite.name: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I go to the Role Manager page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: When I click to edit the "Instructor" role
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: Then I am on the Role Editor page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I see that the form is not read only
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I see the "Restore to Default" button in the Role Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: When I fill in the role name "Instructor Test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I set the Edit Student License privilege to "true"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I click the "Submit" button in the Role Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: Then I am on the Role Manager page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I see the "Instructor Test" role in the list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I do not see the "Instructor" role in the list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: When I click to edit the "Instructor Test" role
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: Then I am on the Role Editor page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: And I see the Edit Student License privilege checked
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Edit the Instructor role and verify the change persists
